name: hbcinstaller
description: Installs Letterbombs, Priiloader, OSCWii [Homebrew Browser], ftpii, MMM [Multi Mod Manager] and more! All in the same program. Program Tree [Shows which programs are used] is included in here. Just say pt and the selection prompt. The program tree is also shown at the help screen. Notice: This just installs the hackmii installer and some other programs along with it.
author: [Project HSI]
